ygData.subject: Re: Spell updates (Vamp Embrace)
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/5/99 5:32:04 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... I d ... I have tested it.  It does work with weapons.  It is worth it I believe the mana cost
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/5/99 5:32:04 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
shdwpanther@... writes:

> I'm wondering if I waisted my three plat on V.Embrace. It doesn't last
> long and this doesn't say anything about it being usable with weapons as
I'd
> heard in-game.

I have tested it. It does work with weapons. It is worth it I believe the
mana cost for the possible damage is OK. And the duration increases as your
level increases (or at least its duration is long enough make it worth its
mana. I tend to get two "flares" off of each casting, making it worth as
much as the higher level Tap spell. I have gotten three, and once even four
off during its duration, making it worth MORE than the higher level Tap.

Sonoroud
